name: Satellone
description:
"It's time for ZE-48 to be decommissioned, it's out of fuel and and serves no more practical use for us."

"Yes sir. Placing ZE-48 in a graveyard orbit around the moon"
"Cut communications, ZE-48 can spend the rest of eternity alone."
"Yes sir!" *crackle*
*silence*

Use the RCS thrusters on your satellite to maneuver, avoiding asteroids and collecting fuel so that you can use your main engine to escape orbit.

*Bug fix within submission hour*

Fixed death text not displaying.
